https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fV32AxpYr2lwaDqV70SJQKA6jqc.jpg In 2005 Lady Ly directed a documentary focusing on the riots that took place in Clichy-Montfermeil. He interviewed a few protagonists and witnesses, using the necessary involvement and distance to understand what was happening. 365 jours à Clichy Montfermeil
